original: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzugs /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form.🔽Form is emptiness.

original: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is form.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra med /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra med /
translated: The emptiness of sound is not sound.🔽Sound is not other than emptiness.

original: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sgra /
analyzed: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sgra /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sound.🔽Emptiness is sound.

original: sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Sound is emptiness.

original: dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri med /
analyzed: dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri med /
translated: The emptiness of smell is not smell.🔽Smell is not other than emptiness.

original: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang dri /
analyzed: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dri /
translated: Emptiness is not other than smell.🔽Emptiness is smell.

original: dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Smell is emptiness.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro med /
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro med /
translated: The emptiness of taste is not taste.🔽Taste is not other than emptiness.

original: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang ro /
analyzed: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang ro /
translated: Emptiness is not other than taste.🔽Emptiness is taste.

original: ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Taste is emptiness.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg med /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg med /
translated: The emptiness of contact is not contact.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no contact.

original: reg las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang reg /
analyzed: reg las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang reg /
translated: Apart from contact there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is itself contact.

original: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Contact is itself emptiness.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no mental phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos med; chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos med; chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from mental phenomena there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos /
translated: Emptiness is itself mental phenomena.

original: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Mental phenomena are themselves emptiness.

original: mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi khams ma yin /🔽stong pa @222a *//🔽nyid las gud na'ang mig gi khams med /
analyzed: mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi khams ma yin / stong pa @222a *// nyid las gud na'ang mig gi khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the eye element is not the eye element.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no eye element.

original: mig gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams /
analyzed: mig gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams /
translated: Apart from the eye element there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is itself the eye element.

original: mig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The eye element is itself emptiness.

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the form realm is not the form realm.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs kyi khams med /🔽gzugs kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs kyi khams med / gzugs kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no form realm.🔽Apart from the form realm there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams /
translated: Emptiness is not the form realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The form realm is emptiness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the eye-consciousness element is not the eye-consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no eye-consciousness element.🔽Apart from the eye-consciousness element there is no emptiness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is not the eye-consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The eye-consciousness element is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the ear element is not the ear element.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med /
translated: The ear element is not different from emptiness.

original: rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is not different from the ear element.🔽The ear element is emptiness and emptiness is the ear element.

original: rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra'i khams med /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the sound element is not the sound element.🔽The sound element is not different from emptiness.

original: sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa @222b nyid kyang sgra'i khams /
analyzed: sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa @222b nyid kyang sgra'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is not different from the sound element.

original: sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The sound element is emptiness and emptiness is the sound element.🔽The emptiness of the ear consciousness element is not the ear consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: The ear consciousness element is not different from emptiness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not different from the ear consciousness element.🔽The ear consciousness element is emptiness and emptiness is the ear consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Emptiness also is the ear-consciousness element.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The very ear-consciousness element is emptiness.

original: sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i khams med /
analyzed: sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the nose element is not the nose element.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no nose element.

original: sna'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams /
analyzed: sna'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams /
translated: Apart from the nose element there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness also is the nose element.

original: sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The very nose element is emptiness.

original: dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri'i khams med /
analyzed: dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the smell element is not the smell element.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no smell element.

original: dri'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams /
analyzed: dri'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams /
translated: Apart from the smell element there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness also is the smell element.

original: dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The very smell element is emptiness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the element of nose consciousness is not the element of nose consciousness.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no element of nose consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Apart from the element of nose consciousness there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the element of nose consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i @223a *//
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i @223a *//
translated: The element of nose consciousness is emptiness.

original: khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i khams med /
analyzed: khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the element of tongue is not the element of tongue.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no element of tongue.

original: lce'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams /
analyzed: lce'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams /
translated: Apart from the element of tongue there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the element of tongue.

original: lce'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The element of tongue is emptiness.

original: ro'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: ro'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the element of taste is not the element of taste.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro'i khams med /
translated: The element of taste is not other than emptiness.

original: ro'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ro'i khams /
analyzed: ro'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ro'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the element of taste.

original: ro'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ro'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The element of taste is emptiness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med /🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of the element of tongue consciousness is not the element of tongue consciousness.🔽The element of taste is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the element of taste.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi khams med /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi khams med /
translated: The element of taste is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the element of body is not the element of body.

original: lus kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: lus kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the element of body.🔽The element of body is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams /
translated: Emptiness is also the element of the body.

original: lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The element of the body itself is emptiness.

original: reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg gi khams med /
analyzed: reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg gi khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the element of touch is not the element of touch. Apart from emptiness there is no element of touch.

original: reg gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: reg gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the element of touch there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams /
translated: Emptiness itself is the element of touch.🔽The element of touch itself is emptiness.

original: reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid @223b do; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid @223b do; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the element of the consciousness of the body is not the element of the consciousness of the body.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no element of the consciousness of the body.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Apart from the element of the consciousness of the body there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the element of the consciousness of the body.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The element of the consciousness of the body itself is emptiness.

original: yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi khams med /
analyzed: yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the mind-constituent is not the mind-constituent.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no mind-constituent.

original: yid kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi khams /
analyzed: yid kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi khams /
translated: Apart from the mind-constituent there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the mind-constituent.

original: yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The mind-constituent itself is also emptiness.

original: chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos kyi khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi khams med /
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos kyi khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the entity-constituent is not the entity-constituent.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no entity-constituent.

original: chos kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams /
analyzed: chos kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams /
translated: Apart from the entity-constituent there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the entity-constituent.

original: chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The entity-constituent itself is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the mind-consciousness-constituent is not the mind-consciousness-constituent.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no mind-consciousness-constituent.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the element of mental consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: The element of mental consciousness is emptiness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sa'i @224a *//
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sa'i @224a *//
translated: Emptiness itself is the element of mental consciousness.

original: khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sa'i khams med /
analyzed: khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sa'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the earth element is not the earth element.🔽Emptiness is not other than the earth element.

original: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams /
analyzed: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams /
translated: The earth element is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the earth element.

original: sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The earth element itself is emptiness.

original: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chu'i khams med /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chu'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the water element is not the water element.🔽Emptiness is not other than the water element.

original: chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams /
analyzed: chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams /
translated: The water element is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the water element.

original: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The water element itself is emptiness.

original: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the fire element is not the fire element.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no fire element.

original: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams /
analyzed: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams /
translated: Apart from the fire element there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the fire element.

original: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The fire element itself is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no wind element.

original: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams /
analyzed: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams /
translated: Apart from the wind element there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The wind element itself is emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the space element is not the space element.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the space element there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The space element is emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @224b pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @224b pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the consciousness element there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams; rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams; rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the consciousness element. The consciousness element is emptiness.

original: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med /
translated: The emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no ignorance.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa /
translated: Apart from ignorance there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is emptiness.

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed  nyid med; 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed  nyid med; 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Formations are not other than emptiness, and emptiness is not other than formations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
translated: Formations themselves are emptiness,

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
translated: and emptiness itself is formations.🔽The emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness, and consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med /
translated: and emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs /
translated: The emptiness of name and form is not name and form, and name and form are not other than emptiness.

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Name and form themselves are emptiness,🔽and emptiness itself is name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud @225a *//🔽na'ang skye mched drug med /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud @225a *// na'ang skye mched drug med /
translated: The emptiness of the six sense sources is not the six sense sources.🔽The six sense sources are not other than emptiness.

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the six sense sources.🔽The six sense sources are emptiness.

original: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med /
analyzed: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med /
translated: The emptiness of contact is not contact.🔽Contact is not other than emptiness.

original: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than contact.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa /
translated: Emptiness is contact.🔽Contact is emptiness.

original: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
translated: The emptiness of sensation is not sensation.🔽Sensation is not other than emptiness.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sensation.🔽Emptiness is sensation.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Sensation is emptiness.

original: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med /
analyzed: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med /
translated: The emptiness of craving is not craving.🔽Craving is not other than emptiness.

original: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sred pa /
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sred pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than craving.🔽Craving is emptiness.

original: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is craving.

original: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med /
analyzed: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med /
translated: The emptiness of grasping is not grasping.🔽Grasping is not other than emptiness.

original: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang len pa /
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang len pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than grasping.🔽Grasping is emptiness.

original: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is grasping.

original: srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med /
analyzed: srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med /
translated: The emptiness of becoming is not becoming.🔽Becoming is not other than emptiness.

original: srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang srid pa /
analyzed: srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang srid pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than becoming.🔽Becoming is emptiness.

original: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is becoming.

original: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of birth is not birth.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @225b skye ba med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @225b skye ba med /
translated: Nor is there arising outside of emptiness.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of arising.

original: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba /
translated: Emptiness is also arising.

original: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Arising is also emptiness.

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi med /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi med /
translated: The emptiness of aging and death is not aging and death.🔽Nor is there aging and death outside of emptiness.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rga shi /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rga shi /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of aging and death.🔽Emptiness is also aging and death.

original: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: Aging and death are also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.🔽Nor is there the perfection of generosity outside of emptiness.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of the perfection of generosity.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of generosity, and the perfection of generosity is emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of morality is not other than emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of morality.🔽Emptiness is the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of morality is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The perfection of patience is not other than emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of patience.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: The perfection of patience is emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson @226a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: brtson @226a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of perseverance.🔽The perfection of perseverance is not other than emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of perseverance.🔽The perfection of perseverance is emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no perfection of meditative stability, and apart from the perfection of meditative stability there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Also, the perfection of meditative stability is not other than emptiness, and emptiness is not other than the perfection of meditative stability.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the perfection of meditative stability.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: Also, the perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of internal phenomena is not the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang nang @226b stong pa nyid /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang nang @226b stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of internal phenomena there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid mad /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid mad /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of external phenomena is not the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of external phenomena there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena is emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of internal and external phenomena is not the emptiness of internal and external phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med /
translated: Also, emptiness is not other than the inner and outer.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid /
translated: Also, the inner and outer is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the inner and outer.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The inner and outer is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is also not emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med /
translated: Also, emptiness of emptiness is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Also, emptiness is not other than the emptiness of emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of great emptiness is also not great emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med /
translated: Also, great emptiness is not other than emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the emptiness of the great.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the great is also emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is not other than emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang don @227a *//🔽dam pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang don @227a *// dam pa stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not other than the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also not the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the unconditioned there is no emptiness.🔽The unconditioned is also the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: Emptiness is also the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of that which is beyond extremes is also not that which is beyond extremes.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no that which is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from that which is beyond extremes there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the limitless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the limitless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also emptiness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med /🔽thog ma dang tha ma @227b med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med / thog ma dang tha ma @227b med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the beginningless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the beginningless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the endless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the endless is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the middle is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the middle is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the beginning, middle, or end is also emptiness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the beginning, middle, or end is also emptiness.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than non-rejectable emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid /
translated: Non-rejectable emptiness is emptiness.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med /
translated: Emptiness is also non-rejectable emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is not the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also emptiness.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med; chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med; chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from phenomena, there is no emptiness at all.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is itself all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: All phenomena are themselves emptiness.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid @228a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid @228a *//
translated: The emptiness of the defining characteristics of all phenomena is not the emptiness of the defining characteristics of all phenomena.🔽Apart from emptiness, there are no defining characteristics of all phenomena.

original: las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the defining characteristics of all phenomena, there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is itself the defining characteristics of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The defining characteristics of all phenomena are themselves emptiness.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of non-observation is not the emptiness of non-observation.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of non-observation.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of non-observation there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of non-observation.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-observation is emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of non-apprehension there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is emptiness.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of essential nature there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the essencelessness of nonentities is not the emptiness of the essencelessness of nonentities.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of the essencelessness of nonentities.

original: dngos @228b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: dngos @228b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the essencelessness of nonentities there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of the essencelessness of nonentities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is also emptiness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four establishments of mindfulness is also not the establishments of mindfulness.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no establishments of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
translated: Apart from the establishments of mindfulness there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the establishments of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The establishments of mindfulness are also emptiness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four right efforts is also not the right efforts.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the right efforts there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba /
translated: Emptiness is also the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The very nature of the four right efforts is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the four legs of manifestation is not the four legs of manifestation.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no four legs of manifestation.🔽Apart from the four legs of manifestation there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the four legs of manifestation.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The four legs of manifestation are not other than emptiness.

original: dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dbang po rnams med /
analyzed: dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dbang po rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the five faculties is not the five faculties.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no five faculties.

original: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa @229a *//🔽nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang dbang po //
analyzed: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa @229a *// nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dbang po //
translated: Apart from the five faculties there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not other than the five faculties.🔽The five faculties are not other than emptiness.

original: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the five powers is not the five powers.

original: stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stobs rnams med /
analyzed: stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stobs rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the five powers is not the powers.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no powers.

original: stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang stobs /
analyzed: stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang stobs /
translated: Apart from the powers there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the powers.

original: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The powers are also emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the seven limbs of enlightenment is not the limbs of enlightenment.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no limbs of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /
translated: Apart from the limbs of enlightenment there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the limbs of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The limbs of enlightenment are also emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no noble eightfold path,🔽and apart from the noble eightfold path there is no emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
translated: Emptiness is the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
translated: and the noble eightfold path is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the four noble truths is not the four noble truths,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: and apart from emptiness there are no four noble truths.🔽Apart from the four noble truths there is no emptiness.

original: stong @229b pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa /
analyzed: stong @229b pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa /
translated: Emptiness is the four noble truths,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
translated: and the four noble truths are emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the meditative stabilities is not the meditative stabilities,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan rnams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan rnams med /
translated: and apart from emptiness there are no meditative stabilities.

original: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the meditative concentrations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan /
translated: The meditative concentrations are emptiness.

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four immeasurables is not the immeasurables.🔽The immeasurables are not other than emptiness.

original: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the immeasurables.🔽The immeasurables are emptiness.

original: tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: Emptiness is the immeasurables.🔽The emptiness of the four formless absorptions is not the formless absorptions.🔽The formless absorptions are not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the formless absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa /
translated: Emptiness is also the formless meditative absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The formless meditative absorptions are also emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the eight deliverances is not the deliverances.🔽The deliverances are not one thing and emptiness another.🔽There are no deliverances apart from emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa /
translated: Emptiness is not one thing and the deliverances another.

original: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @230a *//🔽snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i @230a *// snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /
translated: Emptiness is the deliverances.🔽The emptiness of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption is not the serial steps of meditative absorption.🔽The serial steps of meditative absorption are not one thing and emptiness another.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: There are no serial steps of meditative absorption apart from emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams /
translated: the emptiness of the successive stages of meditative absorption,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the successive stages of meditative absorption themselves are emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the gate of liberation that is emptiness, the gate of liberation that is signlessness, and the gate of liberation that is wishlessness is not the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
translated: Emptiness is the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the gateway to liberation that is emptiness, the gateway to liberation that is signlessness, and the gateway to liberation that is wishlessness is also emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the six superknowledges is also not the superknowledges.🔽The superknowledges are not other than emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams @230b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams @230b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the superknowledges.🔽The superknowledges are emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the superknowledges.
