original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the meditative stabilizations is also not the meditative stabilizations.🔽The meditative stabilizations are not other than emptiness.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the meditative stabilizations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are emptiness.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The meditative stabilities themselves are emptiness.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways is not the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med / gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no dhāraṇī gateways.🔽Apart from the dhāraṇī gateways there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
translated: Emptiness is not the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways themselves are emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is not the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽Apart from the ten powers of the tathāgatas there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs /
translated: Emptiness is not the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas themselves are emptiness.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four fearlessnesses is also not the fearlessnesses,🔽and the fearlessnesses are also not emptiness.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no fearlessnesses,🔽and apart from the fearlessnesses there is no emptiness.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong @231a *// pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong @231a *// pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Emptiness is also the fearlessnesses,

original: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the fearlessnesses are also emptiness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is also not the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽and the detailed and thorough knowledges are also not emptiness.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa /
translated: and apart from the detailed and thorough knowledges there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the detailed and thorough knowledges are also emptiness.

original: byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med /
translated: The emptiness of great loving kindness is not great loving kindness.🔽Great loving kindness is not other than emptiness.

original: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po //
analyzed: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po //
translated: Emptiness is not other than great loving kindness.🔽Emptiness is great loving kindness.

original: byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
translated: Great loving kindness is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med /
translated: Great compassion is not other than emptiness.

original: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than great compassion.🔽Emptiness is great compassion.

original: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po; ;snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po; ;snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Great compassion is emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is not the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med /
translated: The distinct attributes of the buddhas are not other than emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the distinct attributes of the buddhas.🔽The distinct attributes of the buddhas are emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med /🔽thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med / thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of the understanding of all is not the understanding of all.🔽The understanding of all is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the understanding of all.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the understanding of all.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the understanding of the aspects of the path is not the understanding of the aspects of the path.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the knowledge of the aspects of the path there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is emptiness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the knowledge of all aspects there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is emptiness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom in that way

original: thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known as skilled in means.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab @232a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab @232a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom in that way

analyzed: skrag par mi 'gyur na /

original: @249a *// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
analyzed: @249a *// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
translated: “The tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas who are present, living, and maintaining the lives of beings in as many world systems in the ten directions as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas, have also🔽

original: po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
analyzed: po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
translated: “Moreover, all the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas who are present, live, and remain in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sand grains in the Gaṅgā River, have prophesied the unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening of those bodhisattva great beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings

original: ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: do not see even the meditative stabilization.

original: bdag ni / snyoms par bzhugs so //
analyzed: bdag ni / snyoms par bzhugs so //
translated: ‘I am resting in meditative equipoise.’

original: zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do //🔽bdag ni / snyoms par 'jug go /🔽bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do // bdag ni / snyoms par 'jug go / bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: They do not become conceited because of that meditative stabilization.🔽‘I am entering meditative equipoise.🔽I will enter meditative equipoise.

original: bdag ni / mnyam par bzhag par gyur to //
analyzed: bdag ni / mnyam par bzhag par gyur to //
translated: I am in meditative equipoise.’

original: zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
translated: They do not become conceited.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o //
translated: In this, there are no thoughts and no movement.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam /

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: de ni / med do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

analyzed: legs par bshad do //

analyzed: 'di yin no //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bslab par bya'o // tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //
translated: “They train in the liberations without apprehending anything.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //
translated: “They train in the formless absorptions without apprehending anything.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo @251b stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo @251b stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin /

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin /

analyzed: snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: why is it that they do not objectify anything?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so //
translated: it is because of utter purity that they do not objectify a self,

original: sems can mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs so //
translated: do not objectify a being,🔽do not objectify a life,

original: 'gro ba mi dmigs so //🔽gso ba mi dmigs so //🔽skyes bu mi dmigs so //🔽gang zag mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba mi dmigs so // gso ba mi dmigs so // skyes bu mi dmigs so // gang zag mi dmigs so //

original: shed can mi dmigs so //🔽shed bdag mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shed can mi dmigs so // shed bdag mi dmigs so //
translated: do not objectify a man,

original: byed pa po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byed pa po mi dmigs so //
translated: do not objectify a doer,

original: tshor ba po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba po mi dmigs so //
translated: do not objectify a feeler,

original: shes pa po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes pa po mi dmigs so //
translated: do not objectify a knower,🔽and

original: mthong ba po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthong ba po mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not apprehended, because of utter purity.🔽Feeling is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par @253a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par @253a *//

original: dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes are not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not apprehended, because of utter purity. The nose is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus mi dmigs so //
translated: The body is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not apprehended, because of utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg mi dmigs so //
translated: Touch is non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: Mental phenomena are non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.🔽The sensory element of the eyes is non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The sensory element of the ears is non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.🔽The sensory element of sounds is non-apprehensible in the extreme of purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: @253b shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @253b shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The smell element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The nose consciousness element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The taste element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue consciousness element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The body element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg gi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg gi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The touch element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The thinking-mind element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The element of mental objects is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The element of mental consciousness is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The earth element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The water element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The fire element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The wind element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The space element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The consciousness element is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu @254a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so // shin tu @254a *//
translated: Ignorance is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so //
translated: Formations are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend name-and-form, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched drug mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched drug mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend the six sense fields, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend contact, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sred pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sred pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend feeling, because of extreme purity.🔽“One does not apprehend craving, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir len pa mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir srid pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir len pa mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir srid pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend grasping, because of extreme purity.🔽“One does not apprehend existence, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend birth, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rga shi mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rga shi mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend old age and death, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend suffering, because of extreme purity.🔽“One does not apprehend origination, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gog pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gog pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “One does not apprehend cessation, because of extreme purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam mi dmigs so //
translated: The path is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The desire realm is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the desire realm.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The form realm is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the form realm. The formless realm is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the formless realm.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of giving is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the perfection of giving.

original: shin tu rnam par @254b dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par @254b dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of patience is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of the perfection of patience.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The signless gate of liberation is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The wishless gate of

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi dmigs so //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽Great love is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po mi dmigs so //
translated: Great compassion is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
translated: A stream enterer is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽A once-returner is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
translated: A non-returner is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽A worthy one is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “The arhat is non-apprehensible because of the utter purity of the three realms.

original: shin tu @255b rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu @255b rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
translated: The pratyekabuddha is non-apprehensible because of the utter purity of the three realms.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is non-apprehensible because of the utter purity of the three realms.🔽Awakening is non-apprehensible because of the utter purity of the three realms.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
translated: The Buddha is non-apprehensible because of the utter purity of the three realms.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Blessed One,

original: rnam par dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa gang lags /
translated: what is purity?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Śāriputra,

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni /
translated: the non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, non-purification, non-coming, non-going, non-apprehension, and non-conditioning of all phenomena—

original: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: this is called purity.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: in this way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no; ;gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no; ;gsol pa /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva trains in all dharmas in that way, without apprehending anything.”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Blessed One,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: in what dharmas does the bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in that way train?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Śāriputra,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in that way

original: chos gang la'ang slob pa med do //
analyzed: chos gang la'ang slob pa med do //
translated: does not train in any dharma at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni /
translated: these dharmas

original: byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: do not exist in the way that foolish ordinary beings are attached to them.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Blessed One,

original: 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa @256a *//🔽lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa @256a *// lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: in what way do these dharmas exist?”

original: ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de /
analyzed: ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “They exist in the way that they do not exist.

original: de ltar yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: de ltar yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Since it does not exist in that way,

original: de'i phyir med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir med ces bya'o //
translated: therefore it is said to be nonexistent.🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi /
analyzed: ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi /
translated: why is it that what does not exist is said to be nonexistent?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: “Śāriputra,🔽form is inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽unconditioned emptiness, emptiness of the unlimited, emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, emptiness of non-discarded, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: and emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽tshor ba nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

translated: Śāradvatīputra,🔽feelings are empty of inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba @256b med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, and the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'du shes nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

translated: perception is empty of inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽and the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: sh'a radva / ti'i bu; 'du byed nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

translated: because of being empty of internal phenomena, because of being empty of external phenomena, because of being empty of external and internal phenomena, because of being empty of emptiness, because of being empty of great extent, because of being empty of the ultimate, because of being empty of conditioned phenomena,🔽because of being empty of unconditioned phenomena, because of being empty of what is beyond extremes, because of being empty of what is beginningless and endless, because of being empty of what is not to be discarded, because of being empty of a basic nature, because of being empty of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because of being empty of its own mark, because of being empty of non-apprehension, because of being empty of non-entities, because of being empty of an intrinsic nature, and because of being empty of the intrinsic nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra!

original: rga shi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid @269a *//
analyzed: rga shi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid @269a *//
translated: because old age and death are empty of internal emptiness,🔽external emptiness,🔽internal and external emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness,🔽great emptiness,

original: dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: ultimate emptiness,🔽conditioned emptiness,🔽unconditioned emptiness,🔽the emptiness of beyond extremes,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of nonrepudiation,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽the emptiness of nonobservation,🔽the emptiness of nonexistence,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

translated: The perfection of generosity is not existent because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra!

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nang stong pa @269b nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nang stong pa @269b nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The perfection of discipline is inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of inherent natures,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: because all phenomena are empty of inherent nature, because they are empty of being empty, because they are empty of ultimate reality, because they are empty of the conditioned, because they are empty of the unconditioned, because they are empty of what is beyond extremes, because they are empty of what is without beginning or end, because they are empty of what is not to be discarded, and because they are empty of an essential nature.🔽“Śāradvatī­putra, the transcendent perfection of patience is empty of inherent existence, because it is empty of inherent existence.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of inherent existence, because it is empty of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of emptiness, because it is empty of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

translated: It is empty of the emptiness of ultimate reality, because it is empty of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of the conditioned, because it is empty of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned, because it is empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, because it is empty of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of what is without beginning or end, because it is empty of the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.🔽It is empty of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, because it is empty of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

translated: because all phenomena are empty of their own intrinsic nature, because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, because of the emptiness of non-entities, because of the emptiness of essential nature, and because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The aspects of enlightenment do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The noble truths do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The perfections do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The emptinesses do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The doors of concentration do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The applications of mindfulness do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The correct exertions do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The supports for miraculous abilities do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The faculties do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The powers do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The branches of enlightenment do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The noble eightfold path does not exist, because of its emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The concentrations do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The immeasurables do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The formless absorptions do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The perfections do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The emptinesses do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The doors of concentration do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The formless absorptions do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The applications of mindfulness do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The correct exertions do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The supports for miraculous abilities do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The faculties do not exist, because of their emptiness of inherent existence.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The powers do not exist

original: dbang po rnams @271b nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dbang po rnams @271b nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The faculties are not existent because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: stobs rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stobs rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The powers do not exist because of inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of non-discarded, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra!

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @272a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @272a *//
translated: The branches of awakening are inner emptiness, outer emptiness,🔽and outer and inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The factors of awakening are not existent, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of inherent identity, the emptiness of non-existent objects, and the emptiness of essential nature and the intrinsic defining characteristics of non-existent objects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'phags pa'i lam rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

translated: The noble paths are not existent because of being empty of internal phenomena, being empty of external phenomena, being empty of both external and internal phenomena, being empty of emptiness, being empty of great extent, being empty of ultimate reality, being empty of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: being empty of unconditioned phenomena, being empty of the unlimited, being empty of that which has neither beginning nor end, being empty of discarding, being empty of inherent existence, being empty of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: being empty of specific characteristics, being empty of non-apprehension, being empty of non-entities, being empty of essential nature, and being empty of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

translated: The noble truths are not existent because of being empty of an intrinsic nature, because of being empty of an other-nature, because of being empty of an intrinsic nature and an other-nature, because of being empty of the past, because of being empty of the future, because of being empty of the present, because of being empty of the internal, because of being empty of the external, because of being empty of the internal and the external, because of being empty of emptiness, because of being empty of the great, because of being empty of the ultimate, because of being empty of the conditioned,🔽because of being empty of the unconditioned, because of being empty of the beyond, because of being empty of the endless and beginningless, because of being empty of the discard, because of being empty of a nature, because of being empty of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because of being empty of its own mark, because of being empty of non-apprehension, because of being empty of non-things, because of being empty of an essence, and because of being empty of the essence of non-things.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra!

original: bsam gtan rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: The absorptions do not exist, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //

translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: tshad med pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa @273a *//
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa @273a *//
translated: The immeasurables do not exist because of inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness,

original: nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //

translated: Śāradvatī­putra, the formless meditative concentrations are empty of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

translated: because all phenomena are empty of their own intrinsic nature, because they are empty of being nonexistent, because they are empty of an essential nature, and because they are empty of the nonexistence of an essential nature.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yong pa ma yin no //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: gang med ba'i chos de dag la yongs su brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
translated: Having imagined those non-existent phenomena, they are attached to name and form. They are attached to the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
translated: They are attached to the perfection of morality.🔽They are attached to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
translated: They are attached to the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @276b mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @276b mngon par zhen to //
translated: They are attached to the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to //
translated: They are attached to the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong ba nyid la mngon par zhen to //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong ba nyid la mngon par zhen to // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽they are fixated on the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽they are fixated on the emptiness of the beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: and they are fixated on the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the emptiness of defining characteristics;🔽they are attached to the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the emptiness of non-entities;🔽they are attached to the emptiness of essential nature;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities;

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
