original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the right efforts;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //🔽dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to // dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the legs of miraculous power;🔽they are attached to the faculties;

original: stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the powers;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to //🔽'phags pa'i lam @277a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to // 'phags pa'i lam @277a *//
translated: they are attached to the branches of enlightenment;

original: yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the noble eightfold path;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they are attached to the noble truths;

original: bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to //🔽tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to // tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they settle down on the meditative stabilities,🔽they settle down on the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //🔽rnam par thar ba rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to // rnam par thar ba rnams la mngon par zhen to //

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyod par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyod par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //

analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to //

original: mngon par zhes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: mngon par zhes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they settle down on the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they settle down on the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: snying rje chen po la mngon par zhe na to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la mngon par zhe na to //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to //

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they settle down on the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to //
translated: they settle down on the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen to //
translated: They are attached to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas /
analyzed: de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas /
translated: Because of such attachment,

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste /
translated: they imagine nonexistent phenomena.

original: de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know and do not see.

analyzed: ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na /

analyzed: gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //

original: 'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo //

original: rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: mig mi shes mi @277b mthong ngo // rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna mi shes mi mthong ngo //

original: lce mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce mi shes mi mthong ngo //

original: lus mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know and do not see the body.

original: yid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo // dri mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know and do not see a form.🔽They do not know and do not see a sound.🔽They do not know and do not see a smell.

original: ro mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ro mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the seven factors of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see emptiness, signlessness, or aspirationlessness.

original: @279a *// mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: @279a *// mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the extrasensory powers.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see great compassion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not know or see the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ltar de dag ni /
analyzed: de ltar de dag ni /
translated: In this way, they

original: byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste /
analyzed: byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste /
translated: They are called “fools” and are counted among them.

original: de dag 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: They do not come from anywhere.

original: gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na; 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na; 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: From where do they not come? They do not come from the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: They do not come from the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: They do not come from the formless realm.

original: nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: They do not come from the śrāvaka level.🔽They do not come from the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no //🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no // de dag ni /
translated: They do not come from the level of the omniscient one.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all modes.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the buddhas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the bodhisattvas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the great beings.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the noble ones.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the arhats.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the pratyekabuddhas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the śrāvakas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the ordinary people.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the gods.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the nāgas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the yakṣas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the gandharvas.

original: yid mi ches pa ste /🔽ji ltar yid mi ches she na /🔽gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid mi ches pa ste / ji ltar yid mi ches she na / gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the asuras.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the garuḍas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the kinnaras.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the mahoragas.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the humans.

original: tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the nonhumans.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the gods, humans, and nonhumans.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the past.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the future.🔽They do not come from the level of the knowledge of all the present.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not come from the

original: mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The eye is empty of eye” is not something to be believed.

original: rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽@279b sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // @279b sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The ear is empty of ear” is not something to be believed.🔽“The nose is empty of nose” is not something to be believed.

original: lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The tongue is empty of tongue” is not something to be believed.

original: lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The body is empty of body” is not something to be believed.🔽“The mind is empty of mind” is not something to be believed.

original: yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Form is empty of form” is not something to be believed.

original: sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Sound is empty of sound” is not something to be believed.

original: dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Smell is empty of smell” is not something to be believed.🔽“Taste is empty of taste” is not something to be believed.

original: ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Touch is empty of touch” is not something to be believed.

original: chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Phenomena are empty of phenomena” is not something to be believed.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the ear consciousness is empty of ear consciousness.🔽They do not believe that the nose consciousness is empty of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the tongue consciousness is empty of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the body consciousness is empty of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the thinking consciousness is empty of thinking consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that ear contact is empty of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas @280a *//
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas @280a *//
translated: They do not believe that the nose-contact is empty of the nose-contact.

original: stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the tongue-contact is empty of the tongue-contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the body-contact is empty of the body-contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the thought-contact is empty of the thought-contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the nose is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind.

original: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the water element is empty of the water element.

original: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the fire element is empty of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the wind element is not trusted as being empty of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nam @280b mkha'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nam @280b mkha'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the space element is not trusted as being empty of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the consciousness element is not trusted as being empty of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: ignorance is not trusted as being empty of ignorance.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: volitional factors are not trusted as being empty of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: consciousness is not trusted as being empty of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: name-and-form is not trusted as being empty of name-and-form.

original: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the six sense sources are not trusted as being empty of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: reg pa reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: contact is not trusted as being empty of contact.

original: tshor ba tshor pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: tshor ba tshor pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: feeling is not trusted as being empty of feeling.

original: sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that craving is empty of craving.

original: len pa len pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: len pa len pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that appropriation is empty of appropriation.🔽They do not believe that existence is empty of existence.

original: srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that birth is empty of birth.

original: rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that old age and death is empty of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of effort is empty of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan @281a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan @281a *//
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is the perfection of meditative stability,

original: gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: and so on up to:🔽the perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: Inner emptiness is inner emptiness,🔽and so on up to:🔽the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities is the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are the applications of mindfulness,🔽and so on up to:🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The ten powers of a tathāgata are the ten powers of a tathāgata,🔽and so on up to:🔽the knowledge of all aspects is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The perfection of giving is the perfection of giving,🔽and so on up to:🔽the perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽and so on up to:🔽the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are the applications of mindfulness,🔽and so on up to:🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The ten powers of a tathāgata are the ten powers of a tathāgata,🔽and so on up to:🔽the knowledge of all aspects is the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The perfection of giving is the perfection of giving,🔽and so on up to:

original: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is not believed in as the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not believed in as the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not believed in as the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not believed in as the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of what is limitless is not believed in as the emptiness of what is limitless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not believed in as the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not believed in as the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong @281b pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong @281b pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is empty of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation is empty of the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is empty of the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is empty of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is empty of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the four right efforts are empty of the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the four legs of magical action are empty of the four legs of magical action.

original: dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the five faculties are empty of the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the five powers are empty of the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the seven aspects of enlightenment are empty of the seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the noble eightfold path is empty of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽bsam gtan rnams @282a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // bsam gtan rnams @282a *//
translated: the noble truths are empty of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the immeasurables are empty of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation are empty of the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are empty of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
translated: the emptiness meditative stabilization is empty of the emptiness meditative stabilization.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the emptiness gate to liberation, the signlessness gate to liberation, and the wishlessness gate to liberation are empty.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the clairvoyances are empty of the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the meditative stabilizations are empty of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the ten tathāgata powers are empty of the ten tathāgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the four fearlessnesses are empty of the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “They do not believe that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽“They do not believe that great love is empty of great love.

original: snying rje chen po snying @282b rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po snying @282b rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “Great compassion is empty of great compassion.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are empty of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.”

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The result of stream enterer is empty of the result of stream enterer.”🔽“The result of once-returner is empty of the result of once-returner.”

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The result of non-returner is empty of the result of non-returner.”

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “The state of a worthy one is empty of the state of a worthy one.”

original: rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: “A pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.”

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //
translated: They do not believe that the knowledge of path aspects is empty of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so //🔽de dag ni /🔽gnas pa ma yin pa ste /🔽ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so // de dag ni / gnas pa ma yin pa ste / ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: They do not believe that the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gtan pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gtan pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.🔽They do not believe that the perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of perseverance is empty of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin /🔽nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin / nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not believe that inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not believe that outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas @283a *//🔽pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas @283a *// pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in ultimate emptiness,🔽they do not stand in conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in unconditioned emptiness,🔽they do not stand in the emptiness of what is beyond limits,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of nonrepudiation,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of a basic nature,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽they do not stand in the emptiness of nonobservation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of nonthings,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the irreversible stage.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /🔽dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin / dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not stand in the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the noble truths.

original: bsam @283b gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam @283b gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin; mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin; mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the undirected gate of liberation. They do not abide in the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin /🔽byams pa chen po la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin / byams pa chen po la gnas pa yin /
translated: They do not abide in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not abide in great love.

original: snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not abide in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They

original: mngon par zhen pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa yin te /
translated: are attached.

original: ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na /
translated: How are they attached?

original: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are attached to form.

original: tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are attached to feeling.

original: 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on perceptions.

original: 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on formations.

original: rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin /🔽mig la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin / mig la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on consciousness.🔽They are fixated on the eyes.

original: la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: they are fixated on the five powers,🔽they are fixated on the seven aspects of enlightenment,🔽they are fixated on the noble eightfold path,🔽they are fixated

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on emptiness that has no beginning or end.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin / byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin /

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin /
translated: They are fixated on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te /
translated: They are fixated on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are called ‘foolish.’

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha @286a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha @286a *//
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Lord,

original: rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing /
translated: do bodhisattva great beings training like that not train in the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and do they not go forth to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord said, “Śāriputra,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin /
translated: bodhisattva great beings training like that do not train in the perfection of wisdom,🔽and they do not go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.”🔽“Lord, if bodhisattva great beings training like that do not train in the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin /
translated: and do not go forth to the knowledge of all aspects,🔽then, Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings train in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How do they go forth to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags /
translated: He asked, “Why, Lord, do those bodhisattva great beings not train in the perfection of wisdom?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Why do they not emerge into the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord said, “Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings, unskilled in means,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: imagine and settle down on the perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: imagine and settle down on the perfection of concentration,🔽imagine and settle down on the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: imagine and settle down on the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: imagine and settle down on the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen / nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to the transcendent perfection of generosity.🔽They investigate and are attached to internal emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to external emptiness.🔽They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of both external and internal.

original: stong pa @286b nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: stong pa @286b nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to great emptiness.🔽They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and are attached to the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to signlessness.🔽They investigate and become attached to wishlessness.🔽They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is nothing whatsoever.🔽They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the intrinsic nature.🔽They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the nature of non-entities.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the nature of no entities.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the nature of entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the nature of other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen; dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen; dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen / yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached to the emptiness that is the nature of no other entities.🔽They investigate and become attached

original: dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la @287a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la @287a *//
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the powers.

original: brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen; mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen; mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the ten tathāgata powers. They conceptualize and are attached to the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to great compassion. They conceptualize and are attached to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They conceptualize and are attached to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la @287b brtags shing mngon par zhen /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la @287b brtags shing mngon par zhen /
translated: They investigate and become fixated on the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas /
translated: and they investigate and become fixated on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin /
translated: do not train in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no //
translated: and they do not attain omniscience.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: de lta lags na /
analyzed: de lta lags na /
translated: if that is the case,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: in what way do great bodhisattva beings train in the transcendent perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar bslab na /
analyzed: ji ltar bslab na /
translated: How should they train

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: in order to attain omniscience?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not apprehend that perfection of wisdom,

original: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
translated: and do not see it,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings train in the perfection of wisdom in that manner,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no //
translated: they will emerge through the knowledge of all aspects by way of non-apprehension.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration do not apprehend that perfection of concentration, and do not see it,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @288a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @288a *//
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: de ltar slob pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa ni /
translated: train in the perfection of wisdom in that manner,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
translated: and through the mode of non-apprehension, they emerge in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of perseverance, they do not apprehend that transcendent perfection of perseverance, and they do not consider it.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni /
translated: when great bodhisattva beings train accordingly in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,
